text:
[Verse]
Walking down the busy street
Faces blur just like a dream
Lost my way but that's okay
Finding light in every scene

[Verse 2]
Clouds above they look so bright
City whispers in the night
Jumping shadows on the ground
Turning lost into a found

[Chorus]
Lost and found oh here we go
Dancing through the highs and lows
Round and round we find our way
In this winding city maze

[Verse 3]
Traffic lights they guide the beat
Pavement rhythm my retreat
Every corner holds a tale
In this world we can't fail

[Bridge]
Step by step and mile by mile
Lost and found it's worth the trial
Every twist and every bend
Leads us to the perfect end

[Chorus]
Lost and found oh here we go
Dancing through the highs and lows
Round and round we find our way
In this winding city maze
title: Lost and Found
